casebody.data:
JIAN SHEN
v.
Charles Hugh MCGOWAN, III No. 432P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 W. Gregory Duke, Attorney at Law, Greenville, for McGowan, Charles Hugh (III). Gina Reyman, Attorney at Law, for Shen, Jian. Rebecca Dixon Eden, Attorney at Law, for Shen, Jian. Yolanda N. Taylor, Attorney at Law, for Shen, Jian. Celia Pistolis, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Shen, Jian

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of December 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
